text: Dinner was hard tonight. I feel disgusting.
Please don't talk about food or what I ate.
Can you remind me why recovery matters?
I want to look in the mirror but I know I shouldn't right now.
Something to distract me for 10 minutes?
I'm being too hard on myself, aren't I?
Write a self-compassion statement I can read.
If I'm struggling with meals, where do I get help?
Just be here with me. No advice.
Save: 'distraction after meals' and 'self-compassion card' helped.
